description: Beginning with the natural numbers, swap [ k*sqrt(2) ] and [ k*(2 + sqrt(2)) ], for all k >= 1.
comments: Self-inverse integer permutation induced by Beatty sequences for sqrt(2) and 2+sqrt(2). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 11 2005
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Beatty Sequence
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
Index entries for sequences related to Beatty sequences
formula: a(A001951(n)) = A001952(n) and a(A001952(n)) = A001951(n). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 11 2005
author: _Clark Kimberling_
